Details: Han Wei's great grandfather: District governor (dao tai)
Unknown Han: County governor in Henan province, by way of exam (scholar) under Qing dynasty
1st son of county governor Han. War hero, went to a famous army school, was paralyzed in battle. Had a daughter, acted as adoptive father to Han Wei so that Han Wei could get an education for free.
Had 4 sons, Manchurian origin, distinguished family

Father of Han Wei: 5th son. Owned property in Kaifeng, son of a county governor, well educated and could speak English, became an opium addict and sold most of the family belongings. Two wives, both rich. Second wife was of Manchurian descent.

Person 1: Julie Han (Zhū Jiāng Yí 朱江怡)​
